message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a unique item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $10500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9500?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll offer the product to you for $10000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $8500?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I've already made significant concessions. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer the product to you for $9250. This is the best I can do. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $8750?

I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer the product to you for $9000. This is the absolute lowest I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $8200?
